history.content:
Thanks for this, Anon Scale. I will let the people who handle those forms know that they can stop any work they are doing on yours.

I'm not sure that the incident form is suited to handling grade issues.  We do have two Student Grievance officers if you have already worked as far as you can with the faculty of a course, and you feel that you're at an impasse, you can talk to one of them. They are Michael Ball and Thomas Courtade.

I wanted to appeal my Spring 2021 CS 70 grade and filled out the incident form as shown in this post (@15285). I received no response from the EECS department and no longer want to move forward with the appeal. So do I need to do anything?
history.subject: No longer want to move forward with CS 70 Grade Appeal
